preference.name: SC_briefcase_pkg_file_name
preference.preference_description: Defines the name format for Briefcase packages (named references attached to Dataset objects). The format is based on the keywords ItemID (Item ID), ItemName (Item Name), RevID (Revision ID), VariantRule (Variant Rule ID), RevRule (Revision Rule), PkgType (Package Type), TargetSite (Remote Site) and TimeStamp (Time Stamp) of the object being exported. The format is any combination of one or more of the above specified keywords. Any other word specified in the format will be treated as a constant. For example a value "ItemID:RevID:TargetSite:TimeStamp" would result in the following generated file name "00001_A_Site1_31-Sep-2011_19-48-30.bcz".
